definition: localized pain disorder (in Chinese medicine)/arthralgia syndrome/bi disorder
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: To choose different drugs based on different stages of arthralgia syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 根据痹证不同时期的病理特点，提出分期辨证用药。

sentences.english: Not only the evils of wind, cold, dampness and heat, but also depression of gan-qi can result in bi-zheng.
sentences.chinese: 痹证病因非独感风寒湿热等外邪所致，肝郁也可致痹。

sentences.english: Rheumatism belongs to arthromyodynia category in TCM.
sentences.chinese: 风湿病属中医痹证范畴。

sentences.english: Thereby, to treat paralysis should pay attention to kidney for treating the root.
sentences.chinese: 故治疗痹证宜“从肾论治”，以治其本。

definition: interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis
illness having to do with obstruction of urine flow/(Chinese medicine)/retention of urine
(TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang/asthenia
disorder of internal organs caused by overexertion
superficial syndrome/illness that has not attacked the vital organs of the human body
(in Chinese medicine) stasis (of blood or other fluids)
